name: TVBrowserViewController
desc: A view controller that presents content in a browsable, full-screen format.

items.name: init?(viewElement: TVViewElement)
items.desc: Create a full-screen browser from a specified view element.

items.name: var dataSource: TVBrowserViewControllerDataSource?
items.desc: The object that provides data to the full-screen browser.

items.name: protocol TVBrowserViewControllerDataSource
items.desc: Methods adopted by the object you use to represent the browser view.

items.name: var delegate: TVBrowserViewControllerDelegate?
items.desc: The object that acts as the delegate and handles callbacks for the browser view.

items.name: protocol TVBrowserViewControllerDelegate
items.desc: Methods for detecting events and performing actions on the browser view.

items.name: var cornerRadius: CGFloat
items.desc: The corner radius, in points, of each full-screen browser item.

items.name: var interitemSpacing: CGFloat
items.desc: The spacing between full-screen browser items.

items.name: var maskInset: UIEdgeInsets
items.desc: The amount by which the content of the cell is inset.

items.name: var centeredViewElement: TVViewElement
items.desc: The full screen browser item that is currently centered on the screen.

items.name: var viewElement: TVViewElement
items.desc: The view element that the full screen browser is constructed from.

items.name: class TVBrowserTransitionAnimator
items.desc: An object that provides animations to and from the full screen browser.
